TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AuthorizationSetDefinition extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Defines the interface for interacting with sets of health record items for authorization purposes. This class is abstract.
Docs.remarks: Permissions on data in a person's health records are always included in an authorization set (whether implicitly via their type or effective date, or explicitly by setting the system set). is the base class for the different types of authorization sets. The concrete class definitions that define the sets are and .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetXml() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetXml () As String

Docs.summary: Retrieves the XML representation of the set. This method is abstract.
Docs.returns: The XML representation of the set as a string.
Docs.remarks: The XML representation adheres to the schema required by the HealthVault methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

Docs.summary: Retrieves the XML representation of the set as a string.
Docs.returns: A string containing the XML representation of the set.
Docs.remarks: The XML representation adheres to the schema required by the HealthVault methods.
